section.heading: Penalty for violation of subchapter.
section.text: Any person who violates any provision of this subchapter shall upon conviction be fined not more than $300.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Licensure, non-health related occupations and professions, excepted occupations, see § 47-2853.04.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Effect of dissolution of Sports Commission: See note to § 3-321.
Construction of Law 10-152: See note to § 3-321.
